title: Peer Learning-Based Workshop for Strengthening Midwifery Preceptor Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic midwifery duties and at least 5 years of clinical experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening practical competencies for current midwifery managers/leaders to perform preceptor roles

learning_goals: Through peer learning activities, learners can explain the core elements of preceptorship: supervision, feedback, and mentoring
Through small-group collaboration, learners can resolve at least three real-world problems encountered when performing preceptor roles
Learners can develop personalized preceptorship implementation plans reflecting formative assessment feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
